text: Malwa Singh (20 March 1946 - 27 April 1990) was an Indian wrestler. He competed in two events at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:1990 deaths Category:Indian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of India Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Sport wrestlers from Delhi Category:Asian Games medalists in wrestling Category:Wrestlers at the 1962 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for India Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for India Category:Medalists at the 1962 Asian Games
title: Malwa Singh
